message.name: ERR_FINANCIAL_COMPONENT_UPDATE_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant payment message update for financial component updation failed.

message.name: ERR_FINANCIAL_COMPONENT_CREATE_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant payment message for financial component creation is failed.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_PAYMENT_ISSUED_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant payment message for the payment instrument creation is failed.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_MODIFIED_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant payment message for payment instrument modification is failed.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_INSTRUMENT_CANCELLED_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant message update for payment instrument cancellation is failed.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_SUSPENDED_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant message update for payment suspension is failed.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_UNSUSPENDED_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant message update for payment unsuspension is failed.

message.name: ERR_PAYMENT_REGENERATE_PAYMENT_MESSAGE
message.locale: The participant message update for payment regeneration is failed.
